text: Pierre Isaac Isidore Mendès France (11 January 1907 – 18 October 1982), known as PMF, was a French politician who served as President of the Council of Ministers (equivalent in the French Fourth Republic to Prime Minister) for eight months from 1954 to 1955. France died on October 18, 1982 in Paris, France at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1907 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Politicians from Paris Category:Prime ministers of France
title: Pierre Mendès France
